Name: Run GhostInspector
Description: Runs GhostInspector smoke tests asynchronously, returning immediately
Author: daniel-simpson

Parameters.Name: suiteId
Parameters.Label: Suite ID
Parameters.HelpText:
Suite ID from Ghostinspector.  Can be found in the suite's URL e.g.: 
https://app.ghostinspector.com/suites/<suiteID>

Parameters.Name: siteUrl
Parameters.Label: Site Base URL
Parameters.HelpText: The site's base URL.  All smoke tests will be run starting from this page.

Parameters.Name: httpAuthUser
Parameters.Label: Username
Parameters.HelpText: The username for use with HTTP Auth (can be left blank for open sites)

Parameters.Name: httpAuthPass
Parameters.Label: Password
Parameters.HelpText: The password for use with HTTP Auth (can be left blank for open sites)

Parameters.Name: apiKey
Parameters.Label: GhostInspector API Key
Parameters.HelpText: GhostInspector API key.  Can be found here: https://app.ghostinspector.com/account
